sentences: Christian "Speesy" Giesler (born 4 July 1970) is a German musician.
He is best known for being the bassist of Kreator, where he was a member of the band from 1994 to 2019.

He appeared on eight studio albums with Kreator, from Cause for Conflict (1995) to Gods of Violence (2017), and at the time of his departure, he was their all-time longest-serving bassist, surpassing Rob Fioretti, who was part of the band for 10 years.
Since 2016, however, he has begun endorsing ESP guitars with a custom bass guitar as well as the AX-104.
